Paramètres utilisés pour les optimisations 

#SBATCH -J osimrl
#SBATCH -e slurm.err
#SBATCH -N 2 # number of nodes
#SBATCH -n 20 # number of cores
#SBATCH --tasks-per-node=20
#SBATCH --mem 18G # memory pool for all cores
#SBATCH --mail-user=florin.dzeladini@epfl.ch
#SBATCH --mail-type=fail
#SBATCH --time=10:00:00





slurm_204.out
mpirun -np $SLURM_NTASKS python optimization_spinalCtrl.py -n $((SLURM_NTASKS-1)) -t CMAES -g 100  --duration=10.0

slurm_207.out et slurm_210.out. ======= SLURM 224 mais avec 50 générations en moins

- slurm_210.out est la suite de slurm_207.out avec les 7 optimisations restantes.

pour slurm_210.out, on prend le checkpoint a partir du 193 où ça a buggé dans slurm_207.out 
 mpirun -np $SLURM_NTASKS python optimization_spinalCtrl.py -n $((SLURM_NTASKS-1)) -t CMAES -g 200 -c /shared-dev/nannini/osimrl_biorob/logs/cmaes_spinal/checkpoint-2D-CMAES_193.pkl --duration=10.0

slurm-217.out === slurm-228.out
On prend la moyenne des deux set de paramètres initiaux. 
Seems like great results. 
mpirun -np $SLURM_NTASKS python optimization_spinalCtrl.py -n $((SLURM_NTASKS-1)) -t CMAES -g 150 --duration=10.0

slurm_227.out

mpirun -np $SLURM_NTASKS python optimization_spinalCtrl.py -n $((SLURM_NTASKS-1)) -t CMAES -g 150 -sig 4.0 --duration=10.0
Same parameters as slurm_217.out and slurm_225.out + sigma = 4 instead of 5.0

slurm_229.out

mpirun -np $SLURM_NTASKS python optimization_spinalCtrl.py -n $((SLURM_NTASKS-1)) -t CMAES -g 150 -sig 4.0 --duration=10.0
Same parameters as slurm_217.out and slurm_225.out + sigma = 4 instead of 5.0; Exactly the same as 227 everything.
Same same except success reward is commented. To see, if we get better results.



slurm-262.out
Ligne de code pour prendre la moyenne des ranges au lieu de prendre la valeur de base 
changement de node :
SBATCH -N 1 # number of nodes
SBATCH -n 40 # number of cores
SBATCH --tasks-per-node=40
SBATCH --mem 20G # memory pool for all cores

mpirun -np $SLURM_NTASKS python optimization_spinalCtrl.py -n $((SLURM_NTASKS-1)) -t CMAES -g 150 --sigma-fb=0.5 --duration=10.0
